segments.text: Hey listen here missy, I've been in this line for an hour and now I'm finally here.  So you're going to take my application.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Is that a demand sir?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's not a demand it's a request.  Will you just take it?  Come on.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I must see it before I just take it.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh.  Look at it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, you completely filled this out wrong.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: No.  You filled out the back part.  You were supposed to fill out the front portion only.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: What are you talking about?  It says fill out that part.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, no, no, no, no.  You're going to have to go back over on the other side-- --second door, up the stairs...
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Okay.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh my God. Can you just transfer it yourself?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No I can't just transfer it myself sir.  You got to do this.  Everyone else is doing the same thing.

segments.text: You don't know! you can't write?  You don't know how to write?

segments.text: Excuse me sir?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What's wrong with you people?  God.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I think you're being a little condescending.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You need to go back over there and fill it out again.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: The information is on there.  Here I'll just fill it out right here.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, no, no, because there are other people in line.  You have to go get a complete new application.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This will take like a minute, okay? Jesus.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, no, no. Sir,you need to get out of the line--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm not going anywhere.  I'm staying right here.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well I'm going to have to call- security because sir, you- there are hundreds of people waiting in line at this D.M.V.-- --We're closing in about half an hour...
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Hey,uh-- Well that's too bad cause I'm getting my license right now.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You will get your license, sir, you have to go fill out-- --another copy...excuse me?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Give me my--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Hey, no, give me that back.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No.  Now I'm going to take this from you because you are obviously misleading
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: -- No.  I'm not waiting...I'm not coming back again.  I don't have time to come back five days.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No.  You couldn't go get another one.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well then you won't have a license will you?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'll have a license.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well not from this department you won't.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes I will.  I'll have this [GARBAGE]
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: just as I want.  Ugh.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir?  I'm going to ask you one more time and then I'm going to call my supervisor

segments.text: who will proceed to call-- security if you can't remove yourself--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Fine.  Call your supervisor.  Ask supervisor over
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and I'll tell her how you've been behaving.

segments.text: Really?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: How would you like that hmm?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: She's not actually in the building.  She's only on the phone. Sir, please leave this line immediately.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh, okay.  Wow.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No.  I'm not going anywhere.  I'm staying here-- I am filling out right now okay just calm down. I'm filling out right now-- Just take the god damn piece of paper.

segments.text: Okay.  I'm going to call security. Security!
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I have it.  I'm taking it.  Doesn't mean I'm going to do anything with it.--Get out of my line!  This is my line.  Get out.  All these people--Sir, you are causing a mob in this department.
